thread.title: CORRECTED-(OFFICIAL)-BRIEF-Exela Technologies Q1 Revenue Rose 8.7 Percent To $393.2 Million (May 10)

title: CORRECTED-(OFFICIAL)-BRIEF-Exela Technologies Q1 Revenue Rose 8.7 Percent To $393.2 Million (May 10)
text:
May 10, 2018 / 8:55 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago CORRECTED-(OFFICIAL)-BRIEF-Exela Technologies Q1 Revenue Rose 8.7 Percent To $393.2 Million (May 10) Reuters Staff
(Corrects to $0.16 from $1.64 in 6th bullet)
May 10 (Reuters) - Exela Technologies Inc:
* EXELA TECHNOLOGIES, INC. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS; PRO FORMA REVENUE GROWTH OF 8.7%; NET LOSS OF $24 MILLION; PRO FORMA ADJUSTED EBITDA GROWTH OF 10.9%; INCREASES 2018 REVENUE AND ADJUSTED EBITDA GUIDANCE * SEES 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA $295 MILLION TO $310 MILLION
* QTRLY NET LOSS PER SHARE $0.16 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
